items.title: Main opposition leader removed from Ivory Coast electoral list
items.description: A court argued Tidjane Thiam forfeited his Ivorian nationality when he became a French citizen in 1987.

items.title: Ghana president suspends chief justice in unprecedented move
items.description: An investigation has been launched into allegations against Gertrude Torkornoo, Ghana's third female chief justice.

items.title: Large explosions at Russian ammunition depot east of Moscow
items.description: Russian military authorities say the blast in a warehouse is due to a fire.

items.title: We're orphans now, say Gaza Catholics the Pope called daily
items.description: Pope Francis had a close relationship with Gaza's tiny Christian community and used his last address to call for a ceasefire.

items.title: More than 20 killed after gunmen open fire on tourists in Indian-administered Kashmir
items.description: The region's chief minister said the attack was "much larger than anything we've seen directed at civilians in recent years".
